about_the_game:
Welcome to the reef!

Congratulations, you have been invited to live on our reef, a paradise world (almost) where you can build your dream home... but beware of the enemies lurking on the islands. A little tour of the property?

Explore the Islands


The world of Survival Advanced is a vast territory composed of several islands, each with its unique characteristics. Each island has a distinct biome, offering an incredible diversity of landscapes, climates, and resources. From lush forests to scorching deserts and frozen tundras, each island tells its own story through its environment and will evolve over the years and with your progression.

Additionally, the islands are inhabited by various formidable enemies, each adapted to its own habitat. Facing these adversaries requires different skills and strategies, making the exploration of each island even more thrilling.

Will you be able to tame the islands to your liking or will you be tamed by them?

Build Your Camp


Construction is the foundation for any newcomer to the island. The laws of the islands do not exist: cut wood, mine minerals, build your personal space, and protect it with your life against formidable enemies.

Improve Your Skills


Not enough storage space, life energy, strength, or endurance? No problem! Thanks to island points, you can level up and thus improve yourself to face any environmental problem.

Every action on the island will allow you to earn XP and thus level up. The more complicated things get, the more you will earn.

Multiplayer?


Unfortunately, the reef is only for you and visitors are not allowed on your territory for now, but R.E.E.F. is doing everything possible to make this happen as soon as possible. More info at

Updates?


We will regularly bring updates to the game, adding new islands, new enemies, and new gameplay mechanics. The reef is constantly evolving.

Join the Reef


The world of Survival Advanced is filled with diversity, challenges, resources, and exciting adventures on each island. Whether you are a construction expert, seasoned hunter, or intrepid explorer, this game offers many opportunities to shape your own survival experience.

The camp you build will become your refuge, your anchor in the midst of the unknown. With improved weapons, exciting exploration, and formidable enemies to defeat, are you ready to take on the challenges and explore these unique islands?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2 Go/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2 Go
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9750H CPU @ 2.60GHz 2.59 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2060 with 6GB GDDR6
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
